AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: smuggled persons, possibly hidden in a pickup truck camper with fogged windows, including males and females from Mexico without immigration documents, unwashed and unkempt, attempting to avoid detection by moving and slouching low or scrambling around to hide from the light of a United States Border Patrol agent's flashlight, reacting physically to the beam of a flashlight
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Maria De Jesus Garcia's Vehicle: means of transportation for smuggled persons, a pickup truck camper involved in a stop and search near the United States-Mexico Border, specifically on Interstate Highway 35, with heavily loaded appearance and fogged windows, driven at an unusually slow speed by Maria De Jesus Garcia, carrying a heavy or overloaded cargo
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.illegal alien smugglers: individuals apprehended by United States Border Patrol agents, involved in a court case related to smuggling, including Stanley Pruszenski and Alfred Baron who made the stop, testifying about the physical reactions of the occupants
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Maria De Jesus Garcia: defendant in a court case related to smuggling, arguing against the use of the Allen Charge
